StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_MIUpdateSchedule]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@NWAID int, @ArrivalDate char(8), @ProcessingDate char(8), @MEPSCode char(3), @ArrivalStatus char(1), @UserLogin varchar(15) AS
declare @MEPSOrgID int set @MEPSOrgID = (Select MEPS_ORGANIZATION_ID from MEPS_ORGANIZATION_LOOKUP where MEPS_CODE = @MEPSCode)
IF @MEPSOrgID IS NULL BEGIN RAISERROR ('Invalid MEPS Organiza.on ID', 16, 1) RETURN --- RAISE ERROR INVALID MEPS END
IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM MEPS_SCHEDULE WHERE NWA_ID = @NWAID AND MEPS_ORGANIZATION_ID = @MEPSOrgID AND PROCESSING_DATE = @ProcessingDate) BEGIN
UPDATE MEPS_SCHEDULE SET PROCESSING_STATUS = @ArrivalStatus, USER_LOGIN = @UserLogin, UPDATE_DATE = GETDATE() WHERE NWA_ID = @NWAID AND MEPS_ORGANIZATION_ID = @MEPSOrgID AND PROCESSING_DATE = @ProcessingDate END ELSE BEGIN INSERT INTO MEPS_SCHEDULE (NWA_ID, MEPS_ORGANIZATION_ID, ARRIVAL_DATE, PROCESSING_DATE, PROCESSING_STATUS, USER_LOGIN, UPDATE_DATE) VALUES (@NWAID, @MEPSOrgID, @ArrivalDate, @ProcessingDate, 'S', @UserLogin, GETDATE()) END
